list.11: Purpose of Website, Fees and Payments to Company
list.11,1: The Website is provided for your entertainment purposes only. The Website does not provide a method to spend real money in order to obtain virtual items or money. The sole purpose of the virtual items is to play the games and/or access features on the Website. The virtual items have no value.
list.11,2: We do not and will not provide any means for you to convert your virtual items or site balance to real money.
list.11,3: The balance does not represent real money and there is no method to “cash out” your virtual items from the Website, withdraw your site balance, demand a refund, or convert your Website balance or virtual items to real dollars. You are purchasing a right to play on our Website using your site balance (depicted in virtual monet (hereinafter - drops) for ease of reference only) but those funds and your virtual items cannot be converted or refunded back to real money.
list.11,4: The Company charges the fee up to 5 % in operation of the Website for users to use "RACE mode" (duel between 2 players).
list.11,5: By providing Company with a payment method, you represent that you are authorized to use the payment method that you provided and that any payment information you provide is true and accurate;
list.11,6: When you use a third-party payment service (e.g. SKF PAY or PayPal® services) to make a purchase on our website, responsibility over your purchase will first be transferred to such a third party before it is delivered to you. The third-party services provider assumes primary responsibility, with our assistance, for payment and payment related customer support. The terms between the third-party services provider and customers who utilize services of the third party are governed by separate agreements and are not subject to the Terms of Service on this website.
